RegularSearchOptions.name: type
RegularSearchOptions.description: The type of search to perform. Default is "auto".

RegularSearchOptions.name: numResults
RegularSearchOptions.description: Number of search results to return. Default 10. Max 10 for basic plans.

RegularSearchOptions.name: includeDomains
RegularSearchOptions.description: List of domains to include in the search.

RegularSearchOptions.name: excludeDomains
RegularSearchOptions.description: List of domains to exclude in the search.

RegularSearchOptions.name: startCrawlDate
RegularSearchOptions.description: Start date for results based on crawl date (ISO format).

RegularSearchOptions.name: endCrawlDate
RegularSearchOptions.description: End date for results based on crawl date (ISO format).

RegularSearchOptions.name: startPublishedDate
RegularSearchOptions.description: Start date for results based on published date (ISO format).

RegularSearchOptions.name: endPublishedDate
RegularSearchOptions.description: End date for results based on published date (ISO format).

RegularSearchOptions.name: category
RegularSearchOptions.description: A data category to focus on.

RegularSearchOptions.name: includeText
RegularSearchOptions.description: List of strings that must be present in webpage text. Max 1 string of up to 5 words.

RegularSearchOptions.name: excludeText
RegularSearchOptions.description: List of strings that must not be present in webpage text. Max 1 string of up to 5 words.

RegularSearchOptions.name: contents
RegularSearchOptions.description: Options for retrieving page contents for each result.

RegularSearchOptions.name: moderation
RegularSearchOptions.description: If true, the search results are moderated for safety.

RegularSearchOptions.name: useAutoprompt
RegularSearchOptions.description: If true, uses autoprompt to enhance the query.

RegularSearchOptions.name: userLocation
RegularSearchOptions.description: The two-letter ISO country code of the user, e.g. US.

RegularSearchOptions.name: additionalQueries
RegularSearchOptions.description: Alternative query formulations for deep search. Max 5 queries. Only for type: "deep".

ContentsOptions.name: maxAgeHours
ContentsOptions.description: Maximum age of cached content in hours. If content is older, it will be fetched fresh. Special values: 0 = always fetch fresh content, -1 = never fetch fresh (cache only). Example: 168 = fetch fresh for pages older than 7 days.

ContentsOptions.name: filterEmptyResults
ContentsOptions.description: If true, filters out results with no contents. Default is true.

ContentsOptions.name: subpages
ContentsOptions.description: Number of subpages to return for each result.

ContentsOptions.name: subpageTarget
ContentsOptions.description: Text used to match/rank subpages in the returned list.

SearchResult.name: title
SearchResult.description: The title of the search result.

SearchResult.name: url
SearchResult.description: The URL of the search result.

SearchResult.name: id
SearchResult.description: The temporary ID for the document.

SearchResult.name: publishedDate
SearchResult.description: The estimated creation date of the content.

SearchResult.name: author
SearchResult.description: The author of the content, if available.

SearchResult.name: score
SearchResult.description: Similarity score between the query/url and the result.

SearchResult.name: image
SearchResult.description: A representative image for the content, if any.

SearchResult.name: favicon
SearchResult.description: A favicon for the site, if any.

SearchResult.name: text
SearchResult.description: The text content of the page (if text option enabled).

SearchResult.name: highlights
SearchResult.description: Highlighted text snippets (if highlights option enabled).

SearchResult.name: summary
SearchResult.description: Summary of the content (if summary option enabled).

SearchResult.name: entities
SearchResult.description: Structured entity data for company or person search results.

SearchResponse.name: requestId
SearchResponse.description: The request ID for the search.

SearchResponse.name: context
SearchResponse.description: The context for the search (for deep search).

SearchResponse.name: costDollars
SearchResponse.description: The cost breakdown for this request.

AnswerOptions.name: text
AnswerOptions.description: Whether to include text in the source results. Default false.

AnswerOptions.name: model
AnswerOptions.description: The model to use for generating the answer. Default "exa".

AnswerOptions.name: stream
AnswerOptions.description: Whether to stream the response. Default false.

AnswerOptions.name: systemPrompt
AnswerOptions.description: A system prompt to guide the LLM's behavior when generating the answer.

AnswerOptions.name: outputSchema
AnswerOptions.description: A JSON Schema specification for the structure you expect the output to take.

AnswerOptions.name: userLocation
AnswerOptions.description: The two-letter ISO country code of the user, e.g. US.

AnswerResponse.name: answer
AnswerResponse.description: The generated answer text (or object matching outputSchema if provided).

AnswerResponse.name: citations
AnswerResponse.description: The sources used to generate the answer.

AnswerResponse.name: requestId
AnswerResponse.description: The request ID for the answer.

AnswerResponse.name: costDollars
AnswerResponse.description: The cost breakdown for this request.

AnswerStreamChunk.name: content
AnswerStreamChunk.description: The partial text content of the answer (if present in this chunk).

AnswerStreamChunk.name: citations
AnswerStreamChunk.type: Array<{id, url, title?, publishedDate?, author?, text?}>
AnswerStreamChunk.description: Citations associated with the current chunk of text (if present).

EntityCompanyProperties.name: foundedYear
EntityCompanyProperties.description: The year the company was founded.

EntityCompanyProperties.name: headquarters
EntityCompanyProperties.description: Information about the company's headquarters location.

EntityCompanyProperties.name: webTraffic
EntityCompanyProperties.description: Web traffic statistics for the company.

CompanyEntity.name: version
CompanyEntity.description: The version of the entity schema.

PersonEntity.name: version
PersonEntity.description: The version of the entity schema.

method_notes.search: The `options.type` parameter accepts: `"keyword"`, `"neural"`, `"auto"` (default), `"hybrid"`, `"fast"`, or `"deep"`. See [RegularSearchOptions](#regularsearchoptions) for all available options.
method_notes.searchAndContents: The `options.type` parameter accepts: `"keyword"`, `"neural"`, `"auto"` (default), `"hybrid"`, `"fast"`, or `"deep"`. See [RegularSearchOptions](#regularsearchoptions) for all available options.
method_notes.findSimilar: See [FindSimilarOptions](#findsimilaroptions) for all available options including `excludeSourceDomain`.
method_notes.findSimilarAndContents: See [FindSimilarOptions](#findsimilaroptions) for all available options including `excludeSourceDomain`.
method_notes.research.get: When called with `stream: true`, returns an `AsyncGenerator<ResearchStreamEvent>` for real-time SSE updates instead of a `Promise<Research>`.
method_notes.research.pollUntilFinished: Options include `pollInterval` (default 1000ms), `timeoutMs` (default 10 minutes), and `events` (boolean to include event log).

results.text: While the health care industry was initially slow to adopt AI...
highlights: AI is transforming healthcare through improved diagnostics and personalized treatment plans.

results.author: John Smith
results.text: In recent years, artificial intelligence has made significant strides...
highlights: AI is reshaping industries and creating new opportunities for innovation.

results.text: The full text content of the article...

citations.title: France - Wikipedia
citations.text: France, officially the French Republic, is a country in... [truncated for brevity]

streamAnswer.content: The capital of France is Paris.

research.get.instructions: What is the latest valuation of SpaceX?

ResearchModel.description: The model to use for research tasks.
